title: Looking for members Semi Casual Positions Open
body:
Recently created a team: Master Gentlemans Club [MGMC]
Currently seeking players preferably plat but not a critical requirement.

Playing casually and serious to improve team play and get better at ranked. Toxic behaviour is strictly out, this is a team game and we should support each other to improve. 

Add me in-game if you are interested: MrBooey
